title: Fix incorrect image swap: restore Hero background and update AVAIL — The Nexus Effect image

requirements.text: Restore the website Hero section background image to the original asset (undo the accidental replacement), so the Hero background is no longer the user-provided AVAIL image.

quotes: Instead you have made the blunder of swapping it in the website hero background. Please correct your mistake immediately

acceptanceCriteria: HeroSection background image renders as it did before the mistaken swap (i.e., not the user-provided AVAIL image).

The Hero section still uses the same src path currently referenced in code (frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSection.tsx), but the underlying asset content is restored to the original hero background.

requirements.text: In the “AVAIL — The Nexus Effect” card within the Selected Signals section, replace the currently shown media (X embed/preview) with the user-provided image, and ensure only that AVAIL card is updated (no other sections).

quotes: You were supposed to swap the existing image in AVAIL — The Nexus Effect portion wiht the image provided by me.

acceptanceCriteria: The “AVAIL — The Nexus Effect” card in frontend/src/components/sections/SelectedSignalsSection.tsx displays the user-provided image.
The user-provided image does not appear as the Hero background.
Other Selected Signals cards continue to behave as they did before (no unintended image changes).

requirements.text: Add the user-provided image as a static frontend asset (served from the frontend’s public assets) and reference it from the “AVAIL — The Nexus Effect” card.

quotes: swap the existing image in AVAIL — The Nexus Effect portion wiht the image provided by me

acceptanceCriteria: The user-provided image is stored under frontend/public/assets/ (or a subfolder) and is referenced via an absolute public path (e.g., /assets/...).
No backend changes are required to serve or fetch the image.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn UI components are read-only and must be composed, not modified).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrap files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
nonGoals: Do not redesign the overall site layout or typography.
Do not change Hero copy, CTAs, or scrolling behavior.
Do not add new authentication, backend logic, or data storage.

edits: Restore the original hero background image content (1.png > 1.png)

preferencesToAdd: Use English for any user-facing text.
